about_the_game:
Particle of God is a post-apocalyptic indie RPG with Survival elements, an open world and tactical battles.
Inspiration and atmosphere from such projects as Fallout, Wasteland, Jagged Alliance, Kenshi.

Thousands of years ago, those who the current population considers gods, terraformed this planet, and then left it. Influential people of our time found one of the machines of the gods, realizing what power and might it could give and what technology it contained, dismantled it for research.

After that, cataclysmic events struck the world: earthquakes, tsunamis, floods, tornadoes, and freezing temperatures. No matter how people tried to withstand the catastrophe, the outcome was foregone. Life survived only where there were other machines of the gods, now operating in emergency mode.

In one of these machines was launched a protocol called "Particle" - an artificial human, which you will control. You will have to eliminate the consequences of the accident and survive in a new uncharted world.

What awaits you in the game:

- A universe with the hot spirit of the post-apocalypse. The opportunity to be in an alternate reality sandbox and write your own story.
- An open, completely seamless world full of wastelands, caves and settlements of warring factions. Explore it without being distracted by loading screens and borders.
- Dozens of character skills and characteristics. It changes to suit your play style.
- A living world responsive to your actions. Without knowing what's coming next, you're deeply drawn into its atmosphere.
- Tactical combat system for exciting up close and distant battles.
- "Mortality" of the character gives you a keen sense of danger and teaches you to adapt to the new world.

Every move you make has consequences. Every decision and chance encounter can change the course of the story. You explore the world, and a chain of unique and surprising events unfolds around you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570, AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB, AMD Radeon 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
  • Additional Notes: When using an integrated graphics card, 2 GB of additional RAM is required. The requirements may change in the final version.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790, AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 3GB, AMD RX 480 4GB
